mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dates, '%Y-%m-%d') as dates, closes FROM web_data.코스피지수내역 ORDER BY dates asc
SELECT no, stock_name, format(market_cap,0) as market_cap FROM web_data.market_cap_data order by no limit 10

select his_time , account_name , stock_code , format(buy_num, 2) as buy_num , format(sell_num, 2) as sell_num from ${account}_history where account_name = #{account} and stock_code = #{stock_code} order by his_time desc
